name: VHCI Business Development
tagline: We create code to decode your business challenges.
description:
Digital Consultancy
We are fluent in two languages: business and digital. Talk to us about your business problems and we’ll help you to identify the best digital solution.
Software Development
We build custom software solutions to automate business processes in a safe and reliable digital environment. They’re platform independent and accessible from any device.
Big Data Analytics
Our analytics modules process vast amounts of data and convert it into easy-to-read summary reports. They allow for faster, more informed and smarter decision making.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Bucharest, Cube Business Center, Calea Floreasca nr 169, Corp X, 2nd Floor
